package kshitij; import java.util.*; public class pune { public static void main(String[] args) { // TODO Auto-generated method stub int sum=0; double avg; System.out.println("enter the num"); Scanner num=new Scanner(System.in); int n=num.nextInt(); int a[]=new int [n]; System.out.println("enter all the element"); for(int i=1;i<=n;i++) { sum=sum+i; } System.out.println("sum is" +sum); avg=(float)sum/n; System.out.println("avg is"+avg); }
